speech prosody

26 Jan 2010 • conferences

Speech Prosody will take place in Chicago this year. There’s a special session on Experimental Approaches to Focus, organized by Yi Xu which promises to be interesting.

Mosaic 2

21 Dec 2009 • conferences • local

The call for papers for Mosaic 2 has been posted. Mosaic is a workshop bringing together semanticists active in Canada. It’s a satellite meeting of the annual meeting of the Canadian Linguistic Association.
